activity.oae-label: ACTIVITY TYPE: FILL IN THE BLANKS
activity.title: Activity 1
activity.instructions: Complete the verbs in the reading. Use the first letter of each verb as a clue. Then check your answers.

graphic.oae-label: graphic file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.jpg or .png)

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

page.text: Every morning, Mike Parker (g)<blank word="gets" blanksize="Small" align="Left"/> up early and (g)<blank word="gets" blanksize="Small"/> dressed before 7:00 AM. He (b)<blank word="brushes" blanksize="large"/> his teeth, (c)<blank word="combs" blanksize="Small"/> his hair, and (s)<blank word="shaves" blanksize="Small"/>. Then he (m)<blank word="makes" blanksize="Small"/> breakfast. Before he goes to work, he (t)<blank word="takes" blanksize="Small"/> out the garbage and he (c)<blank word="checks" blanksize="Small"/> e-mail. Then he (t)<blank word="takes" blanksize="Small"/> the bus to work.

graphic.oae-label: graphic file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.jpg or .png)

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

page.text: Mike's wife, Susan, (g)<blank word="gets" blanksize="Small"/> up after 7:00 and (e)<blank word="eats" blanksize="Small"/> breakfast. She (ex)<blank word="exercises" blanksize="Medium"/> and (l)<blank word="listens" blanksize="Small"/> to music. Then she (t)<blank word="takes" blanksize="Small"/> a shower and she (p)<blank word="puts" blanksize="Small"/> on her makeup. Before she goes to work, she (w)<blank word="washes" blanksize="Medium"/> the dishes. Then she (w)<blank word="walks" blanksize="Small"/> to work.

graphic.oae-label: graphic file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.jpg or .png)

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

page.text: When Mike and Susan (c)<blank word="come" blanksize="Small"/> home, they (m)<blank word="make" blanksize="Small"/> dinner and (w)<blank word="watch" blanksize="Small"/> TV. Sometimes they (r)<blank word="read" blanksize="Small"/> or they (d)<blank word="do" blanksize="Small"/> the laundry. Then they (g)<blank word="get" blanksize="Small"/> undressed and they (g)<blank word="go" blanksize="Small"/> to bed.

graphic.oae-label: graphic file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.jpg or .png)

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

page.text: On the weekend, Mike and Susan always (g)<blank word="go" blanksize="Small"/> shopping and (c)<blank word="clean" blanksize="Small"/> the house. On Saturdays, Mike sometimes (p)<blank word="plays" blanksize="Small"/> soccer. In the evening, they (g)<blank word="go" blanksize="Small"/> out for dinner. Sometimes they (g)<blank word="go" blanksize="Small"/> to the movies or (v)<blank word="visit" blanksize="Small"/> friends.
